document_data.name: Force
document_data.mainbody: '''Force''' was a magical [[weapon quality|quality]] that could be added to any weapon, even ammunition such as [[arrow]]s.{{Cite web/The Lone Drow: Companions of the Hall}}
document_data.Use: It allowed the wielder to make destructive blasts of magical force with each attack. The weapon could even shatter through a [[Shield (spell)|''shield'']] spell or ''[[bracers of armor]]''. Incorporeal creatures could also be hurt by ''force'' weapons.
document_data.Creation: Applying the ''force'' property required the spell ''[[wall of force]]''.
document_data.Examples: * ''[[Taulmaril]]'', the personal ranged weapon of [[Catti-brie]], was a ''+3 force [[keen]] [[elven bow|elven]] [[longbow]]''.
